Posts.Content: Hi, I also have mestastatic breast cancer to my liver. I am currently looking for alternatives. I just started chemo yesterday with switching to this oncologist. I had another oncologist that had me in hormone treatment that wasn't even working and made me feel miserable  The chemo is better even though I will lose my hair. Would you like to corresond?
Posts.Title: 26 and have Metastatic Breast Cancer to Lung
